title: ???? We’re Hiring: Virtual Assistant for Outreach & Appointment Setting! ????
job_overview:
Join Blurred.co, a fast-growing platform helping creators monetize their content!

We’re looking for a Virtual Assistant with:

? Proven experience in appointment setting / outreach
? Fluent (C2) English
? Available 8 hours/day, 5 days/week

???? Starting pay: $3/hour + potential for growth & bonuses!

If you’re driven, communicative, and ready to grow with a registered US company — apply now!
